name: Murmur Creative
description:
Murmur Creative is a branding and web agency that has been creating beautiful and memorable experiences for clients (and their customers) for over 10 years. Murmur offers branding, packaging, web design and development, search engine optimization, and more.
Our goal is to partner with amazing brands and help them grow. We do this through collaboration and by sharing our ideas, talent, creativity, and expertise with our partners. 
We approach each new project as a unique opportunity to create something beautiful and useful. We eschew cookie-cutter solutions.
Testimonial:
“As a new business owner, I certainly know the importance of a website. What I didn’t fully understand was the difference between a website and a really good website. For our newest business we had very high website design expectations based on our previous website efforts with the first business. We were referred to Murmur by a longtime friend and we knew after the first meeting with them that we would not be disappointed. Not only did they design our perfect company logo but they created for us the most beautiful website we could have imagined. Perfect in design and style for our business with content that is easy to access and manage, I am still so thrilled whenever I open up our home page. It was easily the best investment we made and now I’m currently working with them to redesign our first business’ website.”
~Matthew Busetto Owner/ Firehouse Restaurant
